welcome: Welcome to your Nuxt 3 PWA Pro scaffold!
installDescription: Add this app to your home screen for a better experience
appSubtitle: Find the best fuel prices in Portugal
selectAtLeastOneFuel: Please select at least one fuel type
tryDifferentFilters: Try different filters or search in another area
pleaseWait: Please wait while we fetch the latest prices
locationNotFound: District or municipality not found for your location.
noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your filters or search in a different area
themeDescription: Choose between light and dark mode
aboutDescription: This app helps you find the best fuel prices in Portugal. Data is sourced from official government APIs and updated regularly.
noFavoritesDescription: Add stations to your favorites to access them quickly
iosInstallInstructions: To install this app on your iPhone or iPad, follow these steps:
iosStep1: Tap the Share button (square with arrow up)
iosStep2: Scroll down and tap "Add to Home Screen"
noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your search criteria or expanding your search area.
